definitions.definition: The full adverse effects; the chief consequences or negative results of a thing or event.
definitions.example: Unfortunately, poor areas such as those in New Orleans bore the brunt of Hurricane Katrina’s winds.

definitions.definition: The major part of something; the bulk.
definitions.example: If you feel tired of walking, just think of the poor donkey who has carried the brunt of our load.

definitions.definition: To bear the brunt of; to weather or withstand.
